title: Udderly Smooth Body Cream Skin Moisturizer, 12-Ounce Jar (Pack of 6)
description: Udderly smooth Udder Cream is a water-based moisturizer. Udderly smooth is greaseless, stainless, with a light, fresh fragrance. Originally developed for use on dairy cows, Udderly smooth , in recent years, the general public has become aware of Udderly smooth Udder Cream.  They use Udderly smooth as an everyday multi-purpose beauty aid due to its rich moisturizing ingredients and performance in softening dry, thirsty skin.

title: Neutrogena Rainbath Refreshing Shower and Bath Gel- 40 oz (Mega Size)
description: Rainbath Shower & Bath Gel cleans, softens and conditions skin without a heavy leave-behind residue. Your skin is left in better condition - feeling smooth, soft and renewed. Its fragrance is a blend of spices, fruits and herbs, providing a clean-fresh burst that awakens your senses and refreshes your entire body.

title: Johnson's No More Tangles Spray Detangler, 10 Ounce (Pack of 2)
description: Works to instantly unlock knots and tangles in wet or dry hair.Easy detangling and manageability
